CHAT.comment: Chi and Mot work well together in this activity , with Chi starting and leading most of what they do. The mood is very playful , with a lot of joking around. Often Mot and Chi play independently , and often they play together. They discuss briefly and experiment with why coins don't stick to other magnets , why some pieces stick and others don't , repulsion , and attraction , but do not go into depth. Video does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

u.a: this is probably the name of a store
EXP
video starts here
MOT and Chi are seated on the floor with the magnets in between them; some objects are stuck to the black base and some are in a pile on the floor
probably voice of <guy smooshed underneath>
clears objects off black base
picks up black base and nearby objects stick to it
successfully attempts to stand a silver man up on the silver circle on the black base
stands a silver man on the black base
stands another silver man on the black base
touches a silver man

puts a silver ball on the hand of a silver man on the black base

whispered

points to silver man with silver stick next to him
attempts unsuccessfully to balance the plastic teddy bear in the hands of another silver man
attempts to place a nickel on one of the silver men on the black base
takes nickel away
attempts to put nickel on the silver man's head again
places the plastic teddy bear on the black base in front of one of the silver men
picks up a magnet ball and drops it , by accident maybe , onto the black base; it knocks over several objects and then sticks to the edge of the silver circle and rolls back and forth there

pushes objects on floor into a pile
whispered
indicates a silver man who is standing upside down on the black base
stacks two silver men on top of one another on the black base across from two men who are stacked already

takes off a silver stick and puts it on the edge of the black base
whispers

attempts to put a nut on the construction which causes it to tilt
MOT successfully manages to get the nut to stick on top of the construction

muttered under breath

deep voice , imitative maybe
holds out another silver stick
